review_blob:
All in all, its an ok summer ale has that same old Shepherd Neame twang taste, theres better local ales out there, Festive Ale from Gadds being one! 

It pours well, with a one finger head with aromas hitting the nose before the smell test. The nose is roasty with bready, citrus and banana types pulling through.

Could buy it again as a last resort 5/10
beer_name: Shepherd Neame Goldings Summer Hop Ale
